amendment.description: To provide for a 6-month extension of provision equalizing urban and rural standardized payment amounts under Medicare Inpatient Hospital Prospective Payment System.

vote.text: Amendment SA 1793 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.

action.text: Amendment SA 1793 proposed by Senator McConnell for Senator Grassley. (consideration: CR S12210; text: CR S12210) To provide for a 6-month extension of provision equalizing urban and rural standardized payment amounts under Medicare Inpatient Hospital Prospective Payment System.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 1793 proposed by Senator McConnell for Senator Grassley.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 1793 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.
